sources.title: Jibla
sources.content:
Jibla or Jiblah (Arabic: جِبْلَة) may refer to:

Jibla, Kuwait, a historic area of Kuwait City
Jibla, Yemen, a town in south-western Yemen, close to Ibb

See also
Jableh, a Syrian city on the coast of the Mediterranean
sources.summary:
